summary: Transcript of FBI Special Agent testimony before a federal grand jury in West Palm Beach regarding Operation Leap Year investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. Details subpoenas issued to banks, Western Union, a chiropractor, health department, and Adult Video Warehouse for records related to Epstein and potential victims.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the investigation, with subpoenas seeking his financial records and connections to potential victims.

persons.name: Thomas Rofranno
persons.context: Subpoenaed for records related to Jeffrey Epstein as a patient.

persons.name: Philip W. May
persons.context: Certified the transcript of the grand jury testimony.

connections.description: Epstein was a patient of Dr. Rofranno, whose records were subpoenaed.

events.title: Grand Jury Testimony
events.description: FBI Special Agent testifies about subpoenas issued in Operation Leap Year investigation targeting Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Subpoenas were issued to Colonial Bank, Palm Beach National Bank & Trust, Western Union, and Chase Bank for Epstein's financial records.
Subpoenas sought wire transfer records from Epstein to potential victims.
Health Department records were subpoenaed for birth certificates of potential victims.
Adult Video Warehouse was subpoenaed for transactions linked to Epstein or his associates.
The investigation was code-named 'Operation Leap Year'.
